attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to include Stephen Fry, actor, comedian, writer, director, all round good egg, in the Queen's Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Fry has contributed vastly to the country's cultural richness for many years. A latter-day Renaissance man, he has made us all laugh, cry, and think with little recognition. In this, his fiftieth year, official approbation would be a fitting thank you from the nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
